knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

```{r}
library(nipals)
library(here)
library(scran)
library(SummarizedExperiment)
library(SingleCellExperiment)
```

```{r}
set.seed(100)
sce <- readRDS(file = here("Data/CPTAC_nolab1/CPTAC_sce.RDS"))
data <- t(assay(sce, "logintensities"))

begin_time <- Sys.time()
  
df <- nipals(data, center = TRUE, scale = F, ncomp = 4, 
             fitted = TRUE, verbose = TRUE)
  
end_time <- Sys.time()
  
time_difference <- end_time - begin_time
cat(time_difference)

saveRDS(object = df, file = paste0(here("Analyses/CPTAC_nolab1/Output/"),"nipals_sce.RDS"))
saveRDS(object = time_difference, 
        file = paste0(here("Analyses/CPTAC_nolab1/Output/"),"nipals_time.RDS"))

```

```{r}
set.seed(100)
for(i in c(1:10)){

  sce <- readRDS(paste0(here("Data","CPTAC_nolab1"),"/CPTAC_MISTOT10_MNAR25_", i, ".RDS"))
  data <- t(sce$data[rowMeans(is.na(sce$data))<1,])
  
  
  
  df <- nipals(data, center = TRUE,  scale = F, ncomp = 4, 
               fitted = TRUE, verbose = TRUE)
    
  saveRDS(object = df, file = paste0(here("Analyses","CPTAC_nolab1","Output"),"/nipals_MISTOT10_MNAR25_", i, ".RDS"))

}
```
